## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AR1, AtCPR1, ATR1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS CYTOCHROME REDUCTASE, ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA CYTOCHROME REDUCTASE 1, P450 reductase 1
- **Description:**   P450 reductase 1;(source:Araport11)

- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
